column2: melt-in-your-mouth filet mignon. the sides of mashed potatoes and broccoli were perfect. the garlic shrimp appetizer was good
column3: but just good. nothing to write home about. the service was attentive and informative
column4: making recommendations when we asked but not too pushy which was nice. it's expensive
column5: but you get what you pay for.. a good quality meal
